catalog_script_client.name: populate leave details on load

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_93acaac52ff2201046c0af5df699b6fe
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Leave Request Input">529b5de02f6e201046c0af5df699b64e</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>populate leave details on load</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   g_form.setValue('requested_by', g_user.getFullName());
   //g_form.setValue('number', new getnextobjnumberpadded());
	
   var ga = new GlideAjax('lmsAjax');
	
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getLeaveBucket');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_user', g_user.userID);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_leavetype', g_form.getValue('leave_type') );
	ga.getXML(getBucket);
	
	function getBucket(response)
	{
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		var result = JSON.parse(answer);
		
		g_form.setValue('accumulated', result.accumulated);
		g_form.setValue('balance', result.balance);
		g_form.setValue('taken', result.taken);
		
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 11:22:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>93acaac52ff2201046c0af5df699b6fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>populate leave details on load</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_573698_lms">31afbb1c2f92201046c0af5df699b64e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">31afbb1c2f92201046c0af5df699b64e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_93acaac52ff2201046c0af5df699b6fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 11:48:27</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
